@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.journals.JournalEntry.mdn9FMsCRMWyyl8M.JournalEntryPage.HqbW6hYYFKzM74Sg#solar-facet]{Solar Facet} exemplify valor, and the most outward expression of a Dreamer. Solar facets give class feats. These class feats are usually affiliated with the Constellation or the Dreamer the facet belongs to.

Engraving these facets will grant the class feats to you even though you do not meet the prerequisites or are of a different class, unless the prerequisite feat or a class feature is necessary to perform any of the actions or gain benefits from the feat.

@UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.journals.JournalEntry.mdn9FMsCRMWyyl8M]{Facets of Creation} are the fragments of creation that persist in the world, encased in crystalline form found in pieces scattered across Alamein. While many only can enjoy them as interesting, beautiful pieces of jewelry, it harbors a powerful memory or idea locked within.

Those with a talent or gift to unlock it can bring forth its miracles into reality, despite being an idea themselves.
